replies.msg:
同女朋友分手三個月了 而我係被分手果個
我應唔應該搵番佢 定係move on?
佢去exchange 三個月 知道佢下個月會返黎香港
呢三個月我用工作去麻醉自己 但都一直諗起佢 自己手痕會睇佢exchange 同學仔story 見到佢蹤跡
我好想佢返黎我身邊 但自己無勇氣去搵佢 因為真係好掛住佢

「唔好同我講帽左 因為我相信佢唔會 亦都應該無」

如果你睇到 我希望你比個機會同你去表白我內心嘅感受

replies.msg:
我已經用工作麻醉左自己成兩個月 間唔中收工會諗起
直到最近得閒左好多 就成日諗返佢

My friend Jason has been having a crush on this girl named Joyce for seven years but Joyce has a boyfriend. His friend said "That's totally fair. She's quite attractive" But he's beginning to realise he has no place in her scheme of things. He's just being a doormat so I told him to forget her. She's just not worth it. His mum said "You will be better off without her" His brother also said "You would be better off without her" He works as an accounting manager at Hilton but if he takes the job in Big 4 he'll be four thousand dollars a month better off but he's still better off now than he was two years ago when he was working below everybody else in the department. He thinks a junior accountant position is beneath him. If he hadn't taken the CPA exam two years ago he wouldn't be working as a manager now. He's a science fiction fan. He said "If scientists really would invent a starship I would quit my job and spend the rest of my life roaming the universe" Recently his sister married her childhood sweetheart. Her father felt she was marrying beneath her though. Her uncle feels her husband is beneath her too. She enjoys socialising with the better off. Two months ago Jason was away on a business trip to Hokkaido. After his trip I said "If you should go there again can you get me this pack of chocolate please?" Jason is a computer expert. His cousin has to write a report which is due on Tuesday but she's having problems with her computer. If Jason will go and fix her computer she'll be so thankful for his help. she also has exams next Monday so she's better off revising at home this weekend. Jason is a kickboxing fan. His favourite fighter Dan won his retirement fight recently. He's eternally grateful to his coaches and thankful that he got a job as a colour commentator after he retired from the sport. All the fans want to see Fred versus Randy. If Fred would sign a deal with the organisation Dana will make the fight happen. Jason's brother works as a concierge at a hotel. Jason said "If it will make you happy I'll come to stay for a night as company for you while your colleagues are away" He threw a party last month. His television is cheap and nasty. As many of us wanted to watch the news I said "If I could turn the television on please" He said "Sure. If you would switch to the news channel" I saw Joey live twice. The first time I saw her concert we were late. I remember I said "Look at the time. The concert will have started" It was quarter to nine. The concert would have started by then. By next century scientists will have invented a starship. (I need to ask professor Chan something so I'm gonna wait outside the lecture hall at six. He'll have finished his lecture)
